#include <conio.h>
#include "iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
{
 int n;
 cout << "Put in your number: ";
 cin >> n;
 int fact = 1;
 int i;
 for ( i = 2 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 )
{
 fact = fact * i;
}
 cout << "\n Answer: ";
 cout << fact;
 cout << endl;
 getch();
}
#include <conio.h>
#include "iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
#include <conio.h>
#include "iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
{
 int i = 0;
 for ( i = 0 ; i < 5 ; i = i + 1 )
{
 cout << i;
}
 cout << endl;
 getch();
}
#include <conio.h>
#include "iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
#include <conio.h>
#include "iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
{
 int n;
 cout << "Put in your number: ";
 cin >> n;
 int fact = 1;
 int i;
 for ( i = 2 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 )
{
 fact = fact * i;
}
 cout << "\n Answer: ";
 cout << fact;
 cout << endl;
 getch();
}
#include <conio.h>
#include "iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
#include <conio.h>
#include "iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
{
 int n;
 cout << "Put in your number: ";
 cin >> n;
 int fact = 1;
 int i;
 for ( i = 2 ; i <= n ; i = i + 1 )
{
 fact = fact * i;
}
 cout << "\n Answer: ";
 cout << fact;
 cout << endl;
 getch();
}
#include <conio.h>
#include "iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
#include <conio.h>
#include "iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
{
 cout << "Put in your number: ";
 int n;
 cin >> n;
 int i = 0;
 for ( i ; i < n ; i = i + 1 )
{
 if ( i % 2 == 0 )
{
 cout << i;
 cout << "\n";
}
}
 cout << endl;
 getch();
}
#include <conio.h>
#include "iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
#include <conio.h>
#include "iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
